NewSaloonDialogueWinter.1: It's so cool that Gus got a Journey of the Prairie King arcade machine.$9#$b#I already have the game on my computer but the arcade machine has a certain feel to it that makes it way better to play on.$1

NewSaloonDialogueWinterMarriage.1: Me and my parents used to come here all the time on Fridays.$0#$b#But I've never really stopped coming, I want to treasure the tradition.$1
NewSaloonDialogueWinterMarriage.2: It's so cold outside tonight, I almost froze up just walking to here.$2#$b#Maybe I should warm myself up with more wine before I go out.$8
NewSaloonDialogueWinterMarriage.3: As much as I would like to bundle up at home watching anime on this chilly night.$1#$b#I've got to dedicate at least one day of the week to talking with others.$9
OneKid0.1: I can't believe we're parents, @. Everything is so different.$9#$e#I'm so happy with you. It's...it's nice to have a family again.$1
OneKid0.2: Jodi and Caroline have told me horror stories about how expensive it is to raise kids.$0#$b#But we haven't had much trouble have we? We're both successful farmers.$9
OneKid0.3: When Gus met %kid1 he broke in tears and hugged all of us.$1#$b#It felt like he was much happier than even us.$9
OneKid1.1: %kid1 laughs when I make funny noises and faces.$9#$e#I love how our home is always full of laughter!$8
OneKid1.2: I showed %kid1 some pictures of their grandparents. They might not ever meet them but I still want them to know their family.$1#$b#You should show $kid1 pictures of your grandpa, they'd love it.$9
OneKid1.3: I had to stop %kid1 from drinking one of my bottles of wine today. They've been really mischevious lately.$5
OneKid2.1: Hey, you! I'm heading to Pierre's soon to pick up baby stuff.$1
OneKid2.2: %kid1 has been feeling a bit lonely without you lately. You should go play with them more often. Invite me too while you're at it.$1
OneKid2.3: Haley was having a bit of trouble when she tried to carry %kid1.$1#$b#To be honest, it was kind of funny.$9
OneKid3.1: %kid1 was playing around in the dirt outside. Had to draw a bath.$0#$e#I feel like %kid1 will be a farmer someday, just like us.$1
OneKid3.2: %kid1 showed interest in the manga I was reading.$1#$e#It reminds me of when I first learned of comics from my dad. It makes me really happy.$9

Patio.1: Hey, you! I'm just here catching up on this manga.$1#$b#This latest chapter is a real page turner!$1

Patio.7: Reading outdoors is great, this fresh air is so nice!$1

PierreShop.2: It's nice to have Pierre's close by, it fits better with my schedule on Friday.$1
